publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3573.2 Bill Wilson: The Post Office, A People’s Bank—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3573) in the name of Hugh Henry, insert at end ", an outcome that would be made more likely by the reversal of the recent decision by the UK Government to close a large number of community post offices, by the sacking of Lord Mandelson and by the dropping of his plans to privatise the Post Office." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-3573.2 Bill Wilson: The Post Office, A People’s Bank—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3573) in the name of Hugh Henry, insert at end ", an outcome that would be made more likely by the reversal of the recent decision by the UK Government to close a large number of community post offices, by the sacking of Lord Mandelson and by the dropping of his plans to privatise the Post Office."
S3M-3573.2 The Post Office, A People’s Bank (lodged on 4 March 2009) Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Brian Adam*
S3M-3573.2 The Post Office, A People’s Bank (lodged on 4 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*, Christina McKelvie*
